data.body: For the function $f(x) = 4(x + 1)^{2}$ and the point $P$ given by $x = -1$ answer each of the following questions.
data.prompt: (a) For the points $Q$ given by the following values of $x$ compute (accurate to at least 8 decimal places) the slope, $mPQ$, of the secant line through points $P$ and $Q$.
data.followUpPrompt: (b) Use the information from (a) to estimate the slope of the tangent line to $f(x)$ at $x = -1$ and write down the equation of the tangent line.
